Name: Pomurska
Description: The northeastern region, known for its rich agricultural land, including fields and vineyards, as well as the Mura River.

Name: Podravska
Description: A region in eastern Slovenia, known for its wine production, as well as the city of Maribor, Slovenia s second-largest city.

Name: Osrednjeslovenska
Description: The central region, known for Ljubljana, Slovenia s capital, as well as nearby forests and hiking destinations.

Name: Zasavska
Description: A small region in central Slovenia, known for its industrial heritage, particularly coal mining, and the town of Trbovlje.

Name: Jugovzhodna Slovenija
Description: The southeastern region, known for its natural beauty and historical sites.

Name: Primorsko-notranjska
Description: A coastal region, known for its Adriatic Sea coastline, including towns like Koper, Piran, and the Karst Plateau.
